title: New Rubic Liquidity Stacking Campaign
body:
Today we created the first Governance poll allowing holders of RBC and BRBC to decide on which network there will be the New Rubic Liquidity Stacking Campaign. 

Now our holders can choose where the next campaign will be run: on BSC or Ethereum network.
author: 0x44955eEe068789CD742F1EC63E8D5811bf3fB041
